member.name: T:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.AdSource
member.summary: Provides a way to define an ad source object that contains info about the ad to be played.

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.AdSource.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of AdSource.

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.AdSource.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of AdSource.
member.param: The type of the ad. Typically, this is "vast".

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.AdSource.#ctor(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of AdSource.
member.param: The payload for the ad. The type of object used here depends on the ad type.
The type of the ad. Typically, this is "vast".

member.name: T:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.ClipAdPayload
member.summary: A single linear clip to play.

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.ClipAdPayload.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of ClipAdPayload

member.name: P:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.ClipAdPayload.MediaSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the source Uri of the ad clip.

member.name: P:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.ClipAdPayload.MimeType
member.summary: Gets or sets the MimeType of the ad clip.

member.name: P:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.ClipAdPayload.ClickThrough
member.summary: Gets or sets the click through Uri for the ad. Note: This is optional.

member.name: T:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.MastAdapter
member.summary: Provides an adapter between the player and the MAST mainsail ad scheduler.

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.MastAdapter.InvokePlay
member.summary: Indicates that playback has started

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.MastAdapter.InvokeStop
member.summary: Indicates that playback has stopped

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.MastAdapter.InvokePause
member.summary: Indicates that playback has been paused.

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.MastAdapter.InvokeMute
member.summary: Indicates thats mute has been selected

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.MastAdapter.InvokeVolumeChange
member.summary: Indicates that the volume has changed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.MastAdapter.InvokeEnd
member.summary: Indicates that playback has ended.

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.MastAdapter.InvokeSeek
member.summary: Indicates that seeking has occured

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.MastAdapter.InvokeItemStart
member.summary: Indicates that playback of a new playlist item has started.

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.MastAdapter.InvokeItemEnd
member.summary: Indicates that playback of a playlist item has finished.

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.MastAdapter.InvokeFullScreenChange
member.summary: Indicates that full screen state has changed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.MastAdapter.InvokePlayerSizeChanged
member.summary: Indicates that the size of the player has changed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.MastAdapter.InvokeError
member.summary: Indicates that an error has occured.

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.MastAdapter.InvokeMouseOver
member.summary: Indicates that the mouse has moved over the player

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.MastAdapter.SetDuration(Windows.Foundation.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Updates the duration of the current playlist item.

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.MastAdapter.SetPosition(Windows.Foundation.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Updates the position of playback.

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.MastAdapter.SetFullScreen(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the fullscreen flag.

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.MastAdapter.SetCaptionsActive(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the flag indicating if captions are active.

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.MastAdapter.SetHasVideo(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the flag indicating if the stream contains video (vs. just audio)

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.MastAdapter.SetHasAudio(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the flag indicating if the stream contains audio (vs. just video)

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.MastAdapter.SetHasCaptions(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the flag indicating if the stream contains captions

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.MastAdapter.SetPlayerWidth(System.Int32)
member.summary: Relays the current width of the player.

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.MastAdapter.SetPlayerHeight(System.Int32)
member.summary: Relays the current height of the player.

member.summary: Relays the current width of the media.

member.name: M:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.MastAdapter.SetContentHeight(System.Int32)
member.summary: Relays the current height of the player.

member.summary: Relays the current bitrate of the media.

member.summary: Relays the current title of the media.

member.summary: Relays the current url of the media.

member.summary: Raised when the current bitrate is requested

member.summary: Raised when the current position is requested

member.summary: Provides a way to return the current bitrate when the CurrentBitrateRequested event is raised.

member.summary: The current bitrate. This should be set by the handler of the event.

member.name: T:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.CurrentPositionRequestedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides a way to return the current position when the CurrentPositionRequested event is raised.

member.name: P:Microsoft.PlayerFramework.Js.Advertising.CurrentPositionRequestedEventArgs.Result
member.summary: The current Position. This should be set by the handler of the event.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of RemoteAdSource
member.param: The Uri to download and turn into a stream payload.
The type of the ad. Normally this is "vast"

member.summary: Loads the ad payload from the web.
